Module com.example.user_interface
Package com.umassboston.camerastreamclient

Class ChatArea

java.lang.Object
com.umassboston.camerastreamclient.ChatArea
public class ChatArea extends Object
The ChatArea class is a custom user interface element for a chat area. The chat area allows users to receive messages and displays them on the screen. It makes use of the AtSign package to connect with a backend and exchange messages.

    Instantiates a new ChatArea object with a given client and a list of backend servers.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatArea

      public ChatArea(org.atsign.common.AtSign client, List<org.atsign.common.AtSign> backends) throws org.atsign.common.AtException
      Instantiates a new ChatArea object with a given client and a list of backend servers.
      Parameters:
      client - The client's AtSign.
      backends - A list of AtSign backend servers.
      Throws:
      org.atsign.common.AtException - if any error occurs while creating the AtsignConnectionManager.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts listening for incoming messages. If the service is already running, this method will not do anything. The incoming messages are displayed in the chat area.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the service from listening for incoming messages. If the service is not running, this method will not do anything.

    • getScrollPane

      public javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane getScrollPane()
      Returns the ScrollPane component of the chat area.
      Returns:
      The ScrollPane object associated with the chat area.
